title: University of Portland professor Martin Monto wins Hugo Beigel Award for Scholarly Excellence (University of ...
text: ( Source : University of Portland ) University of Portland sociology professor Martin Monto has received the Hugo Beigel Award for Scholarly Excellence from the Society for the Scientific Study of Sexuality . The award goes to the best paper
